title: WiShipping
description: Developed a responsive e-commerce platform using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) with Redux for state management.
tech: React.js, Tailwind CSS, AOS Animation, Framer Motion

title: Cypress — Ultimate SaaS Workspace
description: A Notion-inspired SaaS app built with Next.js 13, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, and Socket.io. Cypress offers folder & file management, real-time collaboration, and a scalable cloud backend — making it a powerful tool for teams to organize, edit, and manage content live.

title: Appointment Booking System
description: Created appointment booking system using React for the frontend, implementing user authentication.

title: Cafe Coffee Day
description: Developed a modern responsive coffee shop website using React and Tailwind, featuring animated sections.
